00039 int USBDCH9_SetupCmd( USBD_Device_TypeDef *device )
00040 {
00041   int status;
00042   USB_Setup_TypeDef *p = device->setup;
00043 
00044   /* Vendor unique, Class or Standard setup commands override ? */
00045   if ( device->callbacks->setupCmd )
00046   {
00047     status = device->callbacks->setupCmd( p );
00048 
00049     if ( status != USB_STATUS_REQ_UNHANDLED )
00050     {
00051       return status;
00052     }
00053   }
00054 
00055   status = USB_STATUS_REQ_ERR;
00056 
00057   if ( p->Type == USB_SETUP_TYPE_STANDARD )
00058   {
00059     switch ( p->bRequest )
00060     {
00061       case GET_STATUS:
00062         status = GetStatus( device );
00063         break;
00064 
00065       case CLEAR_FEATURE:
00066         status = ClearFeature( device );
00067         break;
00068 
00069       case SET_FEATURE:
00070         status = SetFeature( device );
00071         break;
00072 
00073       case SET_ADDRESS:
00074         status = SetAddress( device );
00075         break;
00076 
00077       case GET_DESCRIPTOR:
00078         status = GetDescriptor( device );
00079         break;
00080 
00081       case GET_CONFIGURATION:
00082         status = GetConfiguration( device );
00083         break;
00084 
00085       case SET_CONFIGURATION:
00086         status = SetConfiguration( device );
00087         break;
00088 
00089       case GET_INTERFACE:
00090         status = GetInterface( device );
00091         break;
00092 
00093       case SET_INTERFACE:
00094         status = SetInterface( device );
00095         break;
00096 
00097       case SYNCH_FRAME:     /* Synch frame is for isochronous endpoints */
00098       case SET_DESCRIPTOR:  /* Set descriptor is optional */
00099       default:
00100         break;
00101     }
00102   }
00103 
00104   return status;
00105 }

00107 static int ClearFeature( USBD_Device_TypeDef *pDev )
00108 {
00109   USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep;
00110   int retVal = USB_STATUS_REQ_ERR;
00111   USB_Setup_TypeDef *p = pDev->setup;
00112 
00113   if ( p->wLength != 0 )
00114   {
00115     return USB_STATUS_REQ_ERR;
00116   }
00117 
00118   switch ( p->Recipient )
00119   {
00120     case USB_SETUP_RECIPIENT_DEVICE:
00121       if ( ( p->wIndex == 0                                 ) &&
00122            ( p->wValue == USB_FEATURE_DEVICE_REMOTE_WAKEUP  ) &&
00123            ( ( pDev->state == USBD_STATE_ADDRESSED     ) ||
00124              ( pDev->state == USBD_STATE_CONFIGURED    )    )    )
00125       {
00126         /* Remote wakeup feature clear */
00127         if ( pDev->configDescriptor->bmAttributes & CONFIG_DESC_BM_REMOTEWAKEUP )
00128           {
00129           /* The device is capable of signalling remote wakeup */
00130           pDev->remoteWakeupEnabled = false;
00131           retVal = USB_STATUS_OK;
00132           }
00133       }
00134       break;
00135 
00136     case USB_SETUP_RECIPIENT_ENDPOINT:
00137       ep = USBD_GetEpFromAddr( p->wIndex & 0xFF );
00138       if ( ep )
00139       {
00140         if ( ( ep->num > 0                            ) &&
00141              ( p->wValue == USB_FEATURE_ENDPOINT_HALT ) &&
00142              ( pDev->state == USBD_STATE_CONFIGURED   )    )
00143         {
00144           retVal = USBDHAL_UnStallEp( ep );
00145         }
00146       }
00147   }
00148 
00149   return retVal;
00150 }

00152 static int GetConfiguration( USBD_Device_TypeDef *pDev )
00153 {
00154   int retVal = USB_STATUS_REQ_ERR;
00155   USB_Setup_TypeDef *p = pDev->setup;
00156   uint8_t *pConfigValue = (uint8_t*)&txBuf;
00157 
00158   if ( ( p->wIndex    != 0                          ) ||
00159        ( p->wLength   != 1                          ) ||
00160        ( p->wValue    != 0                          ) ||
00161        ( p->Direction != USB_SETUP_DIR_IN           ) ||
00162        ( p->Recipient != USB_SETUP_RECIPIENT_DEVICE )    )
00163   {
00164     return USB_STATUS_REQ_ERR;
00165   }
00166 
00167   if ( pDev->state == USBD_STATE_ADDRESSED )
00168   {
00169     *pConfigValue = 0;
00170     retVal = USBD_Write( 0, pConfigValue, 1, NULL );
00171   }
00172 
00173   else if ( pDev->state == USBD_STATE_CONFIGURED )
00174   {
00175     retVal = USBD_Write( 0, &pDev->configurationValue, 1, NULL );
00176   }
00177 
00178   return retVal;
00179 }
00180 
00181 static int GetDescriptor( USBD_Device_TypeDef *pDev )
00182 {
00183   int index;
00184   uint16_t length = 0;
00185   const void *data = NULL;
00186   int retVal = USB_STATUS_REQ_ERR;
00187   USB_Setup_TypeDef *p = pDev->setup;
00188 
00189   if ( ( p->Recipient != USB_SETUP_RECIPIENT_DEVICE ) ||
00190        ( p->Direction != USB_SETUP_DIR_IN           )    )
00191   {
00192     return USB_STATUS_REQ_ERR;
00193   }
00194 
00195   index = p->wValue & 0xFF;
00196   switch ( p->wValue >> 8 )
00197   {
00198     case USB_DEVICE_DESCRIPTOR :
00199       if ( index != 0 )
00200       {
00201         break;
00202       }
00203       data   = pDev->deviceDescriptor;
00204       length = pDev->deviceDescriptor->bLength;
00205       break;
00206 
00207     case USB_CONFIG_DESCRIPTOR :
00208       if ( index != 0 )
00209       {
00210         break;
00211       }
00212       data   = pDev->configDescriptor;
00213       length = pDev->configDescriptor->wTotalLength;
00214       break;
00215 
00216     case USB_STRING_DESCRIPTOR :
00217       if ( index < pDev->numberOfStrings )
00218       {
00219         USB_StringDescriptor_TypeDef *s;
00220         s = ((USB_StringDescriptor_TypeDef**)pDev->stringDescriptors)[index];
00221 
00222         data   = s;
00223         length = s->len;
00224       }
00225       break;
00226   }
00227 
00228   if ( length )
00229   {
00230     retVal = USBD_Write( 0, (void*)data, EFM32_MIN(length, p->wLength), NULL );
00231   }
00232 
00233   return retVal;
00234 }

00236 static int GetInterface( USBD_Device_TypeDef *pDev )
00237 {
00238   int retVal = USB_STATUS_REQ_ERR;
00239   USB_Setup_TypeDef *p = pDev->setup;
00240   uint8_t *pAlternateSetting = (uint8_t*)&txBuf;
00241 
00242   /* There is currently no support for alternate interface settings. */
00243 
00244   if ( ( p->wIndex      >= pDev->numberOfInterfaces      ) ||
00245        ( p->wLength     != 1                             ) ||
00246        ( p->wValue      != 0                             ) ||
00247        ( p->Direction   != USB_SETUP_DIR_IN              ) ||
00248        ( p->Recipient   != USB_SETUP_RECIPIENT_INTERFACE )    )
00249   {
00250     return USB_STATUS_REQ_ERR;
00251   }
00252 
00253   if ( pDev->state == USBD_STATE_CONFIGURED )
00254   {
00255     *pAlternateSetting = 0;
00256     retVal = USBD_Write( 0, pAlternateSetting, 1, NULL );
00257   }
00258 
00259   return retVal;
00260 }
00261 
00262 static int GetStatus( USBD_Device_TypeDef *pDev )
00263 {
00264   USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep;
00265   int retVal = USB_STATUS_REQ_ERR;
00266   USB_Setup_TypeDef *p = pDev->setup;
00267   uint16_t *pStatus = (uint16_t*)&txBuf;
00268 
00269   if ( ( p->wValue    != 0                ) ||
00270        ( p->wLength   != 2                ) ||
00271        ( p->Direction != USB_SETUP_DIR_IN )    )
00272   {
00273     return USB_STATUS_REQ_ERR;
00274   }
00275 
00276   switch ( p->Recipient )
00277   {
00278     case USB_SETUP_RECIPIENT_DEVICE:
00279       if ( ( p->wIndex == 0                              ) &&
00280            ( ( pDev->state == USBD_STATE_ADDRESSED  ) ||
00281              ( pDev->state == USBD_STATE_CONFIGURED )    )    )
00282       {
00283         *pStatus = 0;
00284 
00285         /* Remote wakeup feature status */
00286         if ( pDev->remoteWakeupEnabled )
00287           *pStatus |= REMOTE_WAKEUP_ENABLED;
00288 
00289         /* Current self/bus power status */
00290         if ( pDev->callbacks->isSelfPowered != NULL )
00291         {
00292           if ( pDev->callbacks->isSelfPowered() )
00293           {
00294             *pStatus |= DEVICE_IS_SELFPOWERED;
00295           }
00296         }
00297         else
00298         {
00299           if ( pDev->configDescriptor->bmAttributes & CONFIG_DESC_BM_SELFPOWERED )
00300           {
00301             *pStatus |= DEVICE_IS_SELFPOWERED;
00302           }
00303         }
00304 
00305         retVal = USBD_Write( 0, pStatus, 2, NULL );
00306       }
00307       break;
00308 
00309     case USB_SETUP_RECIPIENT_INTERFACE:
00310       if ( ( ( pDev->state == USBD_STATE_ADDRESSED     ) &&
00311              ( p->wIndex   == 0                        )    ) ||
00312            ( ( pDev->state == USBD_STATE_CONFIGURED    ) &&
00313              ( p->wIndex   <  pDev->numberOfInterfaces )    )    )
00314       {
00315         *pStatus = 0;
00316         retVal = USBD_Write( 0, pStatus, 2, NULL );
00317       }
00318       break;
00319 
00320     case USB_SETUP_RECIPIENT_ENDPOINT:
00321       ep = USBD_GetEpFromAddr( p->wIndex & 0xFF );
00322       if ( ep )
00323       {
00324         if ( ( ( pDev->state == USBD_STATE_ADDRESSED     ) &&
00325                ( ep->num     == 0                        )    ) ||
00326              ( pDev->state   == USBD_STATE_CONFIGURED         )    )
00327         {
00328           /* Send 2 bytes w/halt status for endpoint */
00329           retVal = USBDHAL_GetStallStatusEp( ep, pStatus );
00330           if ( retVal == USB_STATUS_OK )
00331           {
00332             retVal = USBD_Write( 0, pStatus, 2, NULL );
00333           }
00334         }
00335       }
00336       break;
00337   }
00338 
00339   return retVal;
00340 }
00341 
00342 static int SetAddress( USBD_Device_TypeDef *pDev )
00343 {
00344   int retVal = USB_STATUS_REQ_ERR;
00345   USB_Setup_TypeDef *p = pDev->setup;
00346 
00347   if ( ( p->wIndex    != 0                          ) ||
00348        ( p->wLength   != 0                          ) ||
00349        ( p->wValue    >  127                        ) ||
00350        ( p->Recipient != USB_SETUP_RECIPIENT_DEVICE )    )
00351   {
00352     return USB_STATUS_REQ_ERR;
00353   }
00354 
00355   if ( pDev->state == USBD_STATE_DEFAULT )
00356   {
00357     if ( p->wValue != 0 )
00358     {
00359       USBD_SetUsbState( USBD_STATE_ADDRESSED );
00360     }
00361     USBDHAL_SetAddr( p->wValue );
00362     retVal = USB_STATUS_OK;
00363   }
00364 
00365   else if ( pDev->state == USBD_STATE_ADDRESSED )
00366   {
00367     if ( p->wValue == 0 )
00368     {
00369       USBD_SetUsbState( USBD_STATE_DEFAULT );
00370     }
00371     USBDHAL_SetAddr( p->wValue );
00372     retVal = USB_STATUS_OK;
00373   }
00374 
00375   return retVal;
00376 }
00377 
00378 static int SetConfiguration( USBD_Device_TypeDef *pDev )
00379 {
00380   int retVal = USB_STATUS_REQ_ERR;
00381   USB_Setup_TypeDef *p = pDev->setup;
00382 
00383   if ( ( p->wIndex      != 0                          ) ||
00384        ( p->wLength     != 0                          ) ||
00385        ( (p->wValue>>8) != 0                          ) ||
00386        ( p->Recipient   != USB_SETUP_RECIPIENT_DEVICE )    )
00387   {
00388     return USB_STATUS_REQ_ERR;
00389   }
00390 
00391   if ( pDev->state == USBD_STATE_ADDRESSED )
00392   {
00393     if ( ( p->wValue == 0                                           ) ||
00394          ( p->wValue == pDev->configDescriptor->bConfigurationValue )    )
00395     {
00396       pDev->configurationValue = p->wValue;
00397       if ( p->wValue == pDev->configDescriptor->bConfigurationValue )
00398       {
00399         USBD_ActivateAllEps( true );
00400         USBD_SetUsbState( USBD_STATE_CONFIGURED );
00401       }
00402       retVal = USB_STATUS_OK;
00403     }
00404   }
00405 
00406   else if ( pDev->state == USBD_STATE_CONFIGURED )
00407   {
00408     if ( ( p->wValue == 0                                           ) ||
00409          ( p->wValue == pDev->configDescriptor->bConfigurationValue )    )
00410     {
00411       pDev->configurationValue = p->wValue;
00412       if ( p->wValue == 0 )
00413       {
00414         USBD_SetUsbState( USBD_STATE_ADDRESSED );
00415         USBD_DeactivateAllEps( USB_STATUS_DEVICE_UNCONFIGURED );
00416       }
00417       else
00418       {
00419         /* Reenable device endpoints, will reset data toggles */
00420         USBD_ActivateAllEps( false );
00421       }
00422       retVal = USB_STATUS_OK;
00423     }
00424   }
00425 
00426   return retVal;
00427 }
00428 
00429 static int SetFeature( USBD_Device_TypeDef *pDev )
00430 {
00431   USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep;
00432   int retVal = USB_STATUS_REQ_ERR;
00433   USB_XferCompleteCb_TypeDef callback;
00434   USB_Setup_TypeDef *p = pDev->setup;
00435 
00436   if ( p->wLength != 0 )
00437   {
00438     return USB_STATUS_REQ_ERR;
00439   }
00440 
00441   switch ( p->Recipient )
00442   {
00443     case USB_SETUP_RECIPIENT_DEVICE:
00444       if ( ( p->wIndex == 0                                ) &&
00445            ( p->wValue == USB_FEATURE_DEVICE_REMOTE_WAKEUP ) &&
00446            ( pDev->state == USBD_STATE_CONFIGURED          )    )
00447       {
00448         /* Remote wakeup feature set */
00449         if ( pDev->configDescriptor->bmAttributes & CONFIG_DESC_BM_REMOTEWAKEUP )
00450           {
00451           /* The device is capable of signalling remote wakeup */
00452           pDev->remoteWakeupEnabled = true;
00453           retVal = USB_STATUS_OK;
00454           }
00455       }
00456       break;
00457 
00458     case USB_SETUP_RECIPIENT_ENDPOINT:
00459       ep = USBD_GetEpFromAddr( p->wIndex & 0xFF );
00460       if ( ep )
00461       {
00462         if ( ( ep->num > 0                            ) &&
00463              ( p->wValue == USB_FEATURE_ENDPOINT_HALT ) &&
00464              ( pDev->state == USBD_STATE_CONFIGURED   )    )
00465         {
00466           retVal = USBDHAL_StallEp( ep );
00467 
00468           ep->state = D_EP_IDLE;
00469           /* Call end of transfer callback for endpoint */
00470           if ( ( retVal == USB_STATUS_OK ) &&
00471                ( ep->state != D_EP_IDLE  ) &&
00472                ( ep->xferCompleteCb      )    )
00473           {
00474             callback = ep->xferCompleteCb;
00475             ep->xferCompleteCb = NULL;
00476             DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nEP cb(), EP stalled" );
00477             callback( USB_STATUS_EP_STALLED, ep->xferred, ep->remaining);
00478           }
00479         }
00480       }
00481   }
00482 
00483   return retVal;
00484 }
00485 
00486 static int SetInterface( USBD_Device_TypeDef *pDev )
00487 {
00488   int retVal = USB_STATUS_REQ_ERR;
00489   USB_Setup_TypeDef *p = pDev->setup;
00490 
00491   /* There is currently no support for alternate interface settings. */
00492 
00493   if ( ( p->wIndex    <  pDev->numberOfInterfaces      ) &&
00494        ( p->wLength   == 0                             ) &&
00495        ( p->wValue    == 0                             ) &&
00496        ( pDev->state  == USBD_STATE_CONFIGURED         ) &&
00497        ( p->Recipient == USB_SETUP_RECIPIENT_INTERFACE )    )
00498   {
00499     /* Reset data toggles on EP's */
00500     USBD_ActivateAllEps( false );
00501     return USB_STATUS_OK;
00502   }
00503   return retVal;
00504 }
